channel.title: I have a client. How do I change the IP it takes you to?
channel.description: Im just wondering how do I change the IP the client takes me to. I have the Src folder with all the javas files. Im wondering which one I go to, to change to ip.

item.title: I have a client. How do I change the IP it takes you to?
item.dc:creator: @Continue Continue
item.description:
@Continue wrote:

You’ll most likely have to do it server sided as well. Search for “127.0.0.1” in the client class of your server folder. Change it to your liking.

Read full topic

item.title: I have a client. How do I change the IP it takes you to?
item.dc:creator: @Continue Continue
item.description:
@Continue wrote:

[quote=“Superd00d, post:3, topic:329412”]508 client? 317 client?
508 client = class68.class
317 client = gui.class[/quote]

No, it doesn’t. The GUI class is optional. Some people might have it and some might not. I doubt he would, though. It would be in the client class, not the GUI.

Read full topic

item.title: I have a client. How do I change the IP it takes you to?
item.dc:creator: @Continue Continue
item.description:
@Continue wrote:

Do you have a refactored or non-refactored client? If refactored, look for this:

server = "127.0.0.1"

Change the above ‘127.0.0.1’ to the IP you want.

If not refactored, and you have non-refactored, look for this:

public final void method6() { method13(20, (byte)4, "Starting up"); if(signlink.sunjava) super.anInt6 = 5; if(aBoolean993) { // aBoolean1252 = true; // return; } aBoolean993 = true; boolean flag = false; String s = method80(true); if(s.endsWith("jagex.com")) flag = true; if(s.endsWith("runescape.com")) flag = true; if(s.endsWith("192.168.1.2")) flag = true; if(s.endsWith("192.168.1.229")) flag = true; if(s.endsWith("192.168.1.228")) flag = true; if(s.endsWith("192.168.1.227")) flag = true; if(s.endsWith("192.168.1.226")) flag = true; if(s.endsWith("127.0.0.1")) flag = true;

When it says “String s = method80(true);”, it’s saying what the IP would work. If it doesn’t work, then it won’t connect. Change the ‘127.0.0.1’ to your IP. Method80 is to connect, hence why in method80, it says if(signlink.mainapp != null) return signlink.mainapp.getDocumentBase().getHost().toLowerCase(); if(super.aFrame_Sub1_15 != null) return "runescape.com"; else return super.getDocumentBase().getHost().toLowerCase();
Telling you to get the host.

Read full topic
